verses.verse: "I permitted Myself to be sought <WH1875> by those who did not ask <WH7592> [for Me;] I permitted Myself to be found <WH4672> by those who did not seek <WH1245> Me. I said, <WH559> 'Here <WH2009> am I, here <WH2009> am I,' To a nation <WH1471> which did not call <WH7121> on My name. <WH8034>

"I have spread <WH6566> out My hands <WH3027> all <WH3605> day <WH3117> long to a rebellious <WH5637> people, <WH5971> Who walk <WH1980> [in] the way <WH1870> which is not good, <WH2896> following <WH310> their own thoughts, <WH4284>
A people <WH5971> who continually <WH8548> provoke <WH3707> Me to My face, <WH6440> Offering <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2076> in gardens <WH1593> and burning <WH6999> incense <WH6999> on bricks; <WH3843>

Who sit <WH3427> among graves, <WH6913> and spend <WH3885> the night <WH3885> in secret <WH5341> places; <WH5341> Who eat <WH398> swine's flesh, <WH1320> And the broth <WH4839> of unclean <WH6292> meat <WH6292> is [in] their pots. <WH3627>

"Who say, <WH559> 'Keep <WH7126> to yourself, do not come <WH5066> near <WH5066> me, For I am holier <WH6942> than you!' These <WH428> are smoke <WH6227> in My nostrils, <WH639> A fire <WH784> that burns <WH3344> all <WH3605> the day. <WH3117>
"Behold, <WH2009> it is written <WH3789> before <WH6440> Me, I will not keep <WH2814> silent, <WH2814> but I will repay; <WH9608> I will even repay <WH9608> into their bosom, <WH2436>

Both their own iniquities <WH5771> and the iniquities <WH5771> of their fathers together, <WH1> "says <WH9191> the Lord. <WH559>" Because <WH3068> they have burned <WH834> incense <WH6999> on the mountains, <WH6999> And scorned <WH2022> Me on the hills, <WH2778> Therefore I will measure <WH1389> their former <WH4058> work <WH7223> into their bosom. <WH6468>"

Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> "As the new <WH8492> wine <WH8492> is found <WH4672> in the cluster, <WH811> And one says, <WH559> 'Do not destroy <WH7843> it, for there is benefit <WH1293> in it,' So <WH3651> I will act <WH6213> on behalf <WH4616> of My servants <WH5650> In order not to destroy <WH7843> all <WH3605> of them.

"And I will bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> offspring <WH2233> from Jacob, <WH3290> And an heir <WH3423> of My mountains <WH2022> from Judah; <WH3063> Even My chosen <WH972> ones <WH972> shall inherit <WH3423> it, And My servants <WH5650> shall dwell <WH7931> there. <WH8033>

"And Sharon <WH8289> shall be a pasture <WH5116> land <WH5116> for flocks, <WH6629> And the valley <WH6010> of Achor <WH5911> a resting <WH7258> place <WH7258> for herds, <WH1241> For My people <WH5971> who <WH834> seek <WH1875> Me.

"But you who forsake <WH5800> the Lord, <WH3068> Who <WH7913> forget <WH7913> My holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022> Who set <WH6186> a table <WH7979> for Fortune, <WH1409> And who fill <WH4390> [cups] with mixed <WH4469> wine <WH4469> for Destiny, <WH4507>

I will destine <WH4487> you for the sword, <WH2719> And all <WH3605> of you shall bow <WH3766> down <WH3766> to the slaughter. <WH2874> Because <WH3282> I called, <WH7121> but you did not answer; <WH6030> I spoke, <WH1696> but you did not hear. <WH8085> And you did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in My sight, <WH5869> And chose <WH977> that in which <WH834> I did not delight. <WH2654>"

Therefore, <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "Behold, <WH2009> My servants <WH5650> shall eat, <WH398> but you shall be hungry. <WH7456> Behold, <WH2009> My servants <WH5650> shall drink, <WH8354> but you shall be thirsty. <WH6770> Behold, <WH2009> My servants <WH5650> shall rejoice, <WH8055> but you shall be put <WH954> to shame. <WH954>

"Behold, <WH2009> My servants <WH5650> shall shout <WH7442> joyfully <WH7442> with a glad <WH2898> heart, <WH3820> But you shall cry <WH6817> out with a heavy <WH3511> heart, <WH3820> And you shall wail <WH3213> with a broken <WH7665> spirit. <WH7307>

"And you will leave <WH5117> your name <WH8034> for a curse <WH7621> to My chosen <WH972> ones, <WH972> And the Lord <WH136> God <WH3068> will slay <WH4191> you. But My servants <WH5650> will be called <WH7121> by another <WH312> name. <WH8034>

"Because <WH834> he who is blessed <WH1288> in the earth <WH776> Shall be blessed <WH1288> by the God <WH430> of truth; <WH543> And he who swears <WH7650> in the earth <WH776> Shall swear <WH7650> by the God <WH430> of truth; <WH543> Because <WH3588> the former <WH7223> troubles <WH6869> are forgotten, <WH7911> And because <WH3588> they are hidden <WH5641> from My sight! <WH5869>

"For behold, <WH2009> I create <WH1254> new <WH2319> heavens <WH8064> and a new <WH2319> earth; <WH776> And the former <WH7223> things <WH7223> shall not be remembered <WH2142> or come <WH5927> to mind. <WH3820>

"But be glad <WH7797> and rejoice <WH1523> forever <WH5703> in what <WH834> I create; <WH1254> For behold, <WH2009> I create <WH1254> Jerusalem <WH3389> [for] rejoicing, <WH1525> And her people <WH5971> [for] gladness. <WH4885>

"I will also rejoice <WH1523> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> and be glad <WH7797> in My people; <WH5971> And there will no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> be heard <WH8085> in her The voice <WH6963> of weeping <WH1065> and the sound <WH6963> of crying. <WH2201>

"No <WH3808> longer <WH5750> will there be in it an infant <WH5764> [who <WH834> lives but a few] days, <WH3117> Or an old <WH2205> man <WH2205> who does not live <WH4390> out his days; <WH3117> For the youth <WH5288> will die <WH4191> at the age <WH1121> of one hundred <WH3967> And the one who does not reach <WH2398> the age <WH1121> of one hundred <WH3967> Shall be [thought] accursed. <WH7043>
"And they shall build <WH1129> houses <WH1004> and inhabit <WH3427> [them;] They shall also plant <WH5193> vineyards <WH3754> and eat <WH398> their fruit. <WH6529>

"They shall not build, <WH1129> and another <WH312> inhabit, <WH3427> They shall not plant, <WH5193> and another <WH312> eat; <WH398> For as the lifetime <WH3117> of a tree, <WH6086> [so shall be] the days <WH3117> of My people, <WH5971> And My chosen <WH972> ones <WH972> shall wear <WH1086> out the work <WH4639> of their hands. <WH3027>

"They shall not labor <WH3021> in vain, <WH7385> Or bear <WH3205> [children] for calamity; <WH928> For they are the offspring <WH2233> of those blessed <WH1288> by the Lord, <WH3068> And their descendants <WH6631> with them.
"It will also come <WH1961> to pass <WH1961> that before <WH2962> they call, <WH7121> I will answer; <WH6030> and while they are still <WH5750> speaking, <WH1696> I will hear. <WH8085>

"The wolf <WH2061> and the lamb <WH2924> shall graze <WH7462> together, <WH259> and the lion <WH9030> shall eat <WH398> straw <WH8401> like the ox; <WH1241> and dust <WH6083> shall be the serpent's food. <WH3899> They shall do <WH7489> no <WH3808> evil <WH7489> or harm <WH7843> in all <WH3605> My holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022>" says <WH559> the Lord. <WH3068>
